body.p: As part of the annual improvements project begun in 2007, the Board reconsidered whether it is appropriate to require a pre‑tax discount rate in paragraph 20 when measuring fair value. The Board noted that a fair value measurement should take into account the attributes, including tax attributes, that a market participant would consider when pricing an asset or liability.
